tool_description: Applies discount codes, promotional offers, and automatic discounts to cart contents with validation and conflict resolution.

cart_id.description: Unique identifier for the shopping cart

discount_codes.description: Array of discount codes to apply

customer_id.description: Customer ID for personalized discount eligibility

apply_automatic.description: Whether to automatically apply eligible discounts

max_discounts.description: Maximum number of discounts to apply

error_messages: Invalid cart ID: Provide a valid, existing cart identifier.
Invalid discount codes: One or more discount codes are expired, invalid, or not applicable.
Discount limit exceeded: Cannot apply more than the maximum allowed discounts.
Customer not eligible: Customer does not meet requirements for specified discounts.
Application failed: System error occurred while applying discounts.
usage: Provide cart_id and optionally discount_codes to apply. Include customer_id for personalized discounts and configure automatic discount application.

applied_discounts.description: Array of discount codes that were successfully applied

total_discount_amount.description: Total monetary value of all applied discounts

discount_percentage.description: Overall discount percentage applied to cart

failed_codes.description: Array of discount codes that failed to apply
